ProcessSpecification.name: PIP5D3DistributeOpenShipFromStockAndDebitAuthorizationStatus
ProcessSpecification.Documentation: The "Distribute Open Ship from Stock and Debit Authorization Status" Partner Interface Process (PIPÂ®) enables a Product Supplier to send a Product Distributor a detailed report (list) of existing Open Ship from Stock and Debit Authorizations.

BusinessDocument.name: Open Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Status Distribution
BusinessDocument.Documentation: This is a master-status Notification of an existing Ship from Stock and Debit Authorization that contains: single or multiple distributor branch(es), single or multiple end customers, all related debit authorization numbers, rejection reasons, part and pricing information, quoted quantity, remaining quantity, critical dates and authorization status code.

Package.name: Distribute Open Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Status

BusinessTransaction.name: Distribute Open Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Status

RequestingBusinessActivity.name: Initiate Open Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Status Distribution

DocumentEnvelope.name: Open Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Status Distribution
DocumentEnvelope.businessDocument: //BusinessDocument[@name="Open Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Status Distribution"]

RespondingBusinessActivity.name: Process Open Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Status Distribution

BinaryCollaboration.name: Distribute Open Ship From Stock And Debit Authorization Status
BinaryCollaboration.Documentation: The PIP Start State is comprised of the following conditions: a. TPA Approved and Exist In Backend System b. Sending Partner Exist as Party and Valid c. Receiving Partner Exist as Party d. Business Document Exist In Backend System and Valid

The PIP End States are comprised of the following conditions: a. Acknowledgment of Receipt Exist In Backend System and Valid b. Receiving Partner Authorized ; PIP Failure State: a. NOT Successful b. Retry Count Exceeded
